paragraph: Top Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors. The photo our community has voted as their favorite is showcased on the @natgeoyourshot Instagram account. Click here to vote for tomorrow’s Top Shot.Your Shot photographer Larry McMillian photographed this special moment between a doe and her fawn. Your Shot Associate Photo Editor Kristen McNicholas writes, “This is a special moment, indeed! I love how little the fawn is in the frame and how the background blurs away. I would love to know more on the technical side of how you were able to capture such a quiet moment. It’s a brilliant photo!” Photograph by Larry McMillianTop Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors.
